SELECT f_com_code_to_nm(a.st_fg) AS st_fg, a.order_id AS order_id, a.vend_id AS vend_id, a.order_dt AS order_dt, a.oust_dt AS oust_dt, a.remk AS remk, b.order_sht_deta_id AS order_sht_deta_id, b.prdt_id AS prdt_id, b.qy AS qy, c.vend_name AS vend_name, d.prdt_nm AS prdt_nm
FROM order_sht a JOIN order_sht_deta b ON a.order_id = b.order_id JOIN vend c ON a.vend_id = c.vend_id JOIN prdt d ON b.prdt_id = d.prdt_id
and c.vend_name like '%'||#{vendName}||'%'
and d.prdt_nm like '%'||#{prdtNm}||'%'
and a.st_fg = #{stFg}
and trunc(a.order_dt) >= to_date(#{startDt}
and trunc(a.order_dt) <= to_date(#{endDt})
and trunc(a.oust_dt) >= to_date(#{startedDt})
and trunc(a.oust_dt) <= to_date(#{endedDt})

SELECT VEND_ID, VEND_NAME, BIZNO, TELNO FROM VEND
AND VEND_NAME LIKE '%'||#{vendName}||'%'

SELECT PRDT_ID, PRDT_NM, SPEC FROM PRDT
AND PRDT_NM LIKE '%'||#{prdtNm}||'%'
